dialogues.text: Davis and Ron spring toward Flip, each making a Mad Dash the Photo. Ron grabs it first. Davis lunges to grab the P from Ron's hands but Ron yanks it away. Davis is up in Ro Face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nigger, What the Fuck did you just do?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you lay one Finger on me, I'll arrest you for assaulting a Police Officer. That's worth about Five Years in Prison. Try me. See if I'm playing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Room falls into Dead Silence. Klansmen mouths hang op watching their Leaders threatened by a DETECTIVE NIGGER. Davis gives Ron the most vicious look imaginable.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ron stares back. It's a SHOWDOWN. Several Men in the Room have their hands at their Waists, seconds away from drawi their Guns.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ron can do only one thing: he smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks for the Photo, Mr. Davis. Big Fan. God Bless WHITE AMERICA.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Davis shakes his Head in Disgust.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bikers and others surround Ron. Flip looks wary knowing something is up. He gets in Ron's face, threatening.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Boy you get ya' ass out NOW!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ron breaks off from the roomful of disdain cutting throug the watching Crowd pushing past Bodies heading toward the front door. Suddenly, Ron's arm is grabbed...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's your Patrice?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ron turns finding Felix holding his arm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Detective Stallworth!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ron JERKS his arm away heading to the exit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ron rushes through the Lot hopping in his unmarked Car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ron throws the Car into gear. He Yells into his Radio.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Attention all Units. Be on the lookout for a White Pickup with a "White Pride" Bumper Sticker. License plate: KE-4108.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ron guns it down the street.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Request Backup. FREEDOM HOUSE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Walker and Felix sit on both sides of Flip. Flip grins at them, then does a double take at Walker, who stares at hi

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ron, I believe you know my friend.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Flip stares at Walker playing it totally cool.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, I don't believe we've ever met.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's been a few years.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, sorry, I can't place you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did you Guys go to School together?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, I went to a Private School in Leavenworth, Kansas.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Isn't that where the Prison is?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matter a fact it is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Walker looks at Flip, who says nothing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know something about that. Don't you, Flip?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Felix's eyes burn into Flip, who doesn't flinch. Suddenly Josh the Waiter interrupts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's an emergency phone call in the Lobby for a -- Felix Kendrickson.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Felix rises.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't say another word. I'll be right back. Flip.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Felix walks off. Walker watches him leave turning to Flip who plays it cool. A confused Davis observes it all.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Across the street from the Freedom House, a nervous Conni on the phone clearly rattled.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jesus! They've got Cops everywhere here! Somebody tipped them off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A Police Cruiser drives past.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My God there goes another one!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Felix talks to her from the Lobby of The Steakhouse tryin keep their conversation private.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All right, calm down, we planned for this. We'll go to Plan B. Okay?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay... Plan B.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can do this. All right. I'll be right there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All right... Love You.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dial tone. Felix has already hung up. She hangs up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Felix eyes Walker at the table with Flip and Davis. Felix waves to Walker. Ivanhoe sees Felix and rushes to join th

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Excuse me Mister Davis.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Walker reluctantly leaves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What was all that about? And why did he keep calling you Flip?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We were in Prison together. Years ago. It's an inside joke.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Davis nods, concerned.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I hope everything's all right?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, but I think he may have violated his Parole. Excuse me...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Flip stands watching Felix and Gang exit the Steakhouse.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ron's Car weaves in between Traffic driving like crazy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ron zooms up to Freedom House SCREECHING to a stop! The e is over. There are a few people outside conversing after event. Ron sees Hakeem and jumps out of the car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's Patrice???

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Patrice and Odetta took Mister Hopkins to his Hotel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ron jumps back in his Ride and burns rubber heading to Patrice's place!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ivanhoe speeds toward Patrice's House with Felix in the passenger seat and Walker hovering over them in the rear.  OMITTED

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Connie drives up. She sits there for a long moment starin Patrice's House. Connie decides. She gets out of the Car carrying her purse. She looks like an Avon lady coming to call. She walks up on Patrice's porch looking around. She CAREFULLY SETS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: down by a pillar on the porch and slowly removes the Bomb She opens the mailbox to place the Bomb. She nervously fl the toggle switch when she sees...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Patrice drives up. Flustered, Connie grabs her purse to p the Bomb back inside while looking at Patrice and Odetta getting out of the Car and getting Groceries from the tru

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Patrice talks to Odetta, not noticing Connie. Connie quic leaves the porch striding to her car sweating, crazy nerv Patrice and Odetta talk, entering her House.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: briskly moves toward the rear of Patrice's Car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ron whips around the corner seeing Connie through the windshield! He SCREECHES to a stop!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Connie tries to nonchalantly head back to her vehicle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ron jumps out the car yelling!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CSPD! Stay where you are!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Connie looks back at Ron, increasing her pace.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't move!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Connie breaks into a run. Ron dashes after her grabbing h as she opens the Pick Up Truck door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's that Bomb? Did you place it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Two fight as she SCREAMS, scratching and clawing at R The Fight moves from the Pick Up Truck as he throws her d on the grass of a near by lawn, subduing the SCREAMING Connie.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where is it!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ron reaches back for his handcuffs...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Freeze!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ron looks right and OFFICER BRICKHOUSE has his Gun pointe him. Then looks left finding OFFICER MYERS, also White, 3 has his revolver aimed at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get off her!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ron slowly rises up off Connie, gradually turning to them With his hands raised you can see Ron's shoulder holster 38 CALIBER SNUB-NOSE. Officer Myers sees it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's got a Gun!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm a Cop! I'm a COP!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Connie springs up from the lawn! Pleading like crazy to t cops!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He attacked me! That Nigger attacked me, he tried to Rape me! Arrest him!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Myers and Brickhouse look at each other, unsure.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm Undercover!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Show me your badge!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ron goes to reach in his pocket but the two Officers make aggressive moves with their Guns! Ron catches himself! He doesn't want to get shot! He decides to just tell them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's in my pocket.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You gonna believe this lying Nigger or me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get on the ground!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm a Cop goddammit! She's got a Bomb! She's a Terrorist!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get on the ground NOW!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ron slowly lowers down to his knees and the two Cops push face down on the street! Felix drives up with Ivanhoe and Walker in the back seat.

dialogues.speaker: STREET
dialogues.text: Felix has pulled up next to Patrice's Volkswagen Beetle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gimme' a detonator.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Walker unzips his Bag quickly handing a Detonator to Feli

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ron yells at the Cops trying to explain!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THAT WOMAN HAS A BOMB SHE'S TRYING TO BLOW THAT HOUSE UP!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Patrice hearing the commotion steps out on the porch with Odetta.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ivanhoe sees Patrice on the porch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There she is! Do it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PATRICE!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Officer Myers jabs Ron in the Belly with his Nightstick. doubles over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ron???

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're Dead Black Bitch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Patrice looks at Felix.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: recovering from the blow SCREAMS to her!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: RUN!!! RUN!!! RUN!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Connie finally sees Felix in the car. Felix sees her, nod She then sees that they are parked... NEXT TO PATRICE'S CAR!!! Connie runs to Felix, screaming!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NO!!! FELIX!!! NO!!! FELIX!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Felix pushes the Button!  THE BOMB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: is attached to the inside of the wheel well of Patrice's  PATRICE'S CAR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EXPLODES! THEN IT BLOWS UP FELIX'S CAR NEXT TO IT!!! A do explosion!!! THE IMPACT BLOWS OUT WINDOWS EVERYWHERE! Pat and Odetta are knocked to the ground. Connie is hurled to street! Glass and car parts flying! Ron and the Cops are ROCKED by the force of the HUGE BLAST!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Connie on her knees on the street, weeping!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: through the smoke and flames is able to make eye contact Patrice, on the steps of her porch. She is shaken but all right. SIRENS in the distance heading toward them!

dialogues.speaker: STREET
dialogues.text: Flip drives up in a fury and jumps out and holds up his BADGE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, you fucking idiots!!! We're undercover.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Officers Brickhouse and Myers lower their guns.

dialogues.speaker: FLIP
dialogues.text: Flip smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The place is full of Off Duty Cops and their Girlfriends, few Wives but mainly Cops drinking and having a good time Ron is in the corner talking with Patrice. They are shari drink looking very intimate. Ron sees something.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jeezus Christ.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your Boyfriend.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Patrice turns and sees.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh My God.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Patrolman Landers nears them with a Beer in his ha

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who's da' Soul Sistah, Stallworth? You been holding out on me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Patrice stares at him with contempt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You don't remember me do you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Landers stares at her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kwame Ture.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Landers doesn't know who that is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stokely Carmichael.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh Yeah, Yeah, you looked good that night but you look even better now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How often do you do that to Black People?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do what?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pull us over for nothing. Harass us. Put your hands all over a Woman in the guise of searching her. Call us everything but A Child of God.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know what you're talking about.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's like what I told you. He just likes taking advantage but in the end he's All Hat and No Cattle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Landers looks around then leans in close to Patrice and R He speaks softly issuing a deadly threat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let me tell you both something, I've been keeping you People in line in this City for years. What I did to your Girl that night, I can do to any of you, Anytime, Anyplace. That's my prerogative. I can even Bust a Cap in ya Black Ass if I feel like it and nuthin' will be done about it. Get it? Wish the both of you got blown up instead of Good White Folks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Patrolman Landers raises up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ohhh, I get it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ron looks at Patrice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You get it, Patrice?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, I totally and completely get it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Landers looks confused with their response.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ron turns toward the Bar and shouts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You get it, Flip?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Behind the Bar, Flip leans out from the back room waving Ron wearing Headphones recording The Conversation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, We got it! We got it all!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ron stands removing his Shirt revealing The Wire he is wearing. Master Patrolman Landers is in shock.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You get it, Chief?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sgt. Trapp appears taking the Beer from Landers' hand tur him around putting Handcuffs on him. Chief Bridges comes the back nearing Landers. The two lock eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, I really, really get it. You're under arrest for Police Misconduct, Sexual Misconduct and Police Brutality.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sgt. Trapp and the Chief usher Master Patrolman Landers, is babbling like a Fool out of The Bar reading him his rights.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ron, walking taller than usual, steps inside The Unit. So of his Colleagues notice and give him a Low-Key Ovation. his Desk is Flip, who is in Great Spirits.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There he is... Man of the Minute.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... not an Hour?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ron smiles, gives Fives all around. They all share a laug

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That Polaroid Stunt you pulled? When you threw your Arms around them, I swear to God I almost Shit myself!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Told you, Ron was born ready.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Born ready is Ron.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sgt. Trapp steps out of his Office.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's The Crazy Son of a Bitch!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Trapp gives Ron a Bear Hug.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You did good.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sarge. We did good.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ron and Flip eyes meet, bonded.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chief wants to see you Guys.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Flip nudges Ron.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey... early promotion?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ron smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ron, Flip, and Sgt. Trapp sit opposite Chief Bridges.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Again, I can't commend you enough for what you've achieved. You know there was not a Single Cross Burning the entire time you were involved?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm aware.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But all good things must come to an end...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sgt. Trapp shakes his head, resigned.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What does that mean?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ron and Flip look at each other, stunned.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Budget Cuts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Budget Cuts?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Inflation... I wish I had a choice. My hands are tied. Besides, it looks like there are no longer any tangible Threats...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Sounds like we did too good a job.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not a Bad Legacy to leave.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bridges takes a deliberate pause. Then, THE Sucker Punch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And I need you, Ron Stallworth, to destroy all Evidence of this Investigation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Excuse me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is total Horseshit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We prefer that The Public never knew about this Investigation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ron and Flip are heated. Sgt. Trapp is silent but gutted.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If they found out...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Cease all further contact with The Ku Klux Klan. Effective immediately. That goes for Flip too. Ron Stallworth...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is some Fucked up Bullshit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Take a week off. Go on vacation with your Girlfriend. We'll hold down The Fort until you get back. Get you another assignment...Narcotics.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ron storms out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ron reflects as he feeds Investigation documents in a Shredder. The documents shred into pieces. Just then, the Undercover Phone Line rings on Ron's desk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ron stares at the Phone, still ringing. He looks at The Documents in his hand, about to feed them into The Shredd Ron stops. Throws The Documents in a Folder. Sweeps some Folders into his Briefcase. Leaves as The Phone still rin

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ron is walking fast now, trying to make it out of The Building with The Evidence but he remembers something. He stops, turns back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ron sits at his Desk, on The Undercover Phone Line. Flip, Jimmy and Sgt. Trapp are behind, both close enough to lis giggling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry we didn't get to spend more One-on-One time together.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, that tragic event. I had just met those Fine Brothers in the cause.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our Chapter is just shaken to the core. And poor Connie not only does she lose her Husband but she's facing a healthy Prison Sentence.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My God. And then there was that one Nigger Detective who threatened me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Goddamn Coloreds sure know how to spoil a Celebration.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Flip and Jimmy snort. Ron holds in a Belly-Laugh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Christ. You can say that again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ron cracks up into his Hand. Sgt. Trapp is wheezing-- his Face Bright Pink. Flip is laughing hard in the background

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can I ask you something? That Nigger Detective who gave you a hard time? Ever get his name?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, I...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Are-uh you sure you don't know who he is? Are-uh you absolutely sure?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Davis looks at his Phone. Ron takes out his SMALL NOTE PA out revealing a list of Racial epitaphs he had written do being on this Investigation. He reads from it to Davis on phone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ron Stallworth and Devin Davis.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cuz' dat Niggah Coon, Gator Bait, Spade, Spook, Sambo, Spear Flippin', Jungle Bunny, Mississippi Wind Chime...Detective is Ron Stallworth you Redneck, Racist Peckerwood Small Dick Motherfucker!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLICK. Ron SLAM DUNKS THE RECEIVER LIKE SHAQ.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Devin Davis's Jaw Drops.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Folders of Evidence sit on The Kitchen Table in a stack i front of Ron. He sips his Lipton Tea and removes from the FILES THE

dialogues.speaker: POLAROID
dialogues.text: Ron hugged up, between Devin Davis and Jesse Nayyar. He t looks at The Klan Membership Card shifting in his hands, gaze fixated on the words.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLOSE - Ron Stallworth KKK Member in Good Standing

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Patrice comes up from behind.

dialogues.speaker: PATRICE
dialogues.text: She pulls out a small handgun from her pocketbook.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Have you Resigned from The KKK?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Affirmative.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Have you handed in your Resignation as a Undercover Detective for The Colorado Springs Police Department?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Negative. Truth be told I've always wanted to be a Cop...and I'm still for The Liberation for My People.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My Conscience won't let me Sleep with The Enemy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Enemy? I'm a Black Man that saved your life.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're absolutely right, and I Thank you for it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Patrice Kisses Ron on the cheek. Good Bye. WE HEAR a KNOC Ron's DOOR. Ron, who is startled, slowly rises. We HEAR another KNOCK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: QUICK FLASHES - of a an OLD TIME KLAN RALLY. Ron moves quietly to pull out his SERVICE REVOLVER from the COUNTER DRAWER. WE HEAR ANOTHER KNOCK on the DOOR. Patrice stands behind him.

dialogues.speaker: QUICK FLASHES
dialogues.text: FRUIT) Ron slowly moves to the DOOR. Ron has his SERVICE REVOLVER up and aimed ready to fire. Ron swings open the DOOR.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Looking in the distance: The Rolling Hills surrounding Th Neighborhood lead towards Pike's Peak, which sits on the horizon like a King on A Throne.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WE SEE: Something Burning.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLOSER-- WE SEE a CROSS, its Flames dancing, sending embe into The BLACK, Colorado Sky. OMITTED

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WE SEE FOOTAGE of NEO-NAZIS, ALT RIGHT, THE KLAN, NEO-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: YOU WILL NOT REPLACE US!!! JEWS WILL NOT REPLACE US!!! BLOOD AND SOIL!!!
